div.h2: UK Core SDS Job Role Name

div.p: A CodeSystem that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.
Copyright Statement: Copyright Â© 2019 NHS Digital
This code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-SDSJobRoleName defines the following codes:

tr.td: Special Salary Scale in Public Health Medicine
Trust Grade Doctor - House Officer level
Trust Grade Doctor - Specialist Registrar level
Trust Grade Doctor - Career Grade level
A&E Staff Nurse (Temporary) London Cluster Only
Other Community Health Service - Social Care Worker
Other Community Health Service - Admin Clerk
Dental Surgeon acting as Hospital Consultant
